name: mycoplasty, or garden of regrets
description:
NOTE: contains body horror, illustrated and described

this sequel to a previous bitsy, osteophagy, contains a set of English haiku centered around regrets that consume. features:

  • bare minimum of interactivity; advance by arrow keys to reach the next verse
  • painful audio, available for separate download
  • fancy bitsy font made by miniwoolf
  • no bitsy hacks besides Mark Wonnacott's add bitsy audio tool

made for the bitsy mushroom jam
